happy.verse: So remember Me; I will remember you. (2:152)
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied. (93:5)

sad.verse: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah. (39:53)

angry.verse: And those who restrain anger and who pardon the people – Allah loves the doers of good. (3:134)
Repel evil with that which is better. (41:34)

anxious.verse: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest. (13:28)
And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs. (33:3)
